landing.title: The app to make your Public Preaching Turns better!
landing.title-desc: PPOC Gen helps you create, manage and automate schedules for your public preaching with exhibitors.
landing.feature-title: Designed for congregations of every size
landing.feature-desc: PPOC Gen focus to help congregations automate turns so we could spend more time preaching and less time managing with tons of features:
landing.free-desc: Since the app don't require any servers it's totally free for everyone
landing.performant-desc: Our app is designed to stored thousands of turns without amazing loading times
landing.granular-desc: With our priority system you can define in a granular way how often the app should use a publisher in the schedules
landing.configurable-desc: Customize by configuring order of the first week day, order by firstname or lastname, language, light or dark theme...
landing.automatic-desc: Decide if you want to generate the turns automatically using our algorith or manually by yourself
landing.export-desc: We support multiple exporting formats so you can visualize your turns in different ways (currently, PDF and ICS formats)
landing.faq-free-answer: Yes! You can enjoy our app for free. This is thanks to storing the data in your device instead of depending on servers
landing.faq-difference: What's the difference between a turn and a schedule?
landing.faq-difference-answer: For our point of view, a schedule is how often you preach with the exhibitors on a specific place (ie: every Monday at 12:00am at X place). In the other hand a turn is the exact day when that schedule happens (ie: Monday 3 of June at 12:00 at X place)
landing.faq-data-answer: No we don't. The only information we have is the country of origin of our visitors, but the rest of the information is stored in your device and we cannot access
landing.faq-more-cong: Is it possible to have more than one congregation?
landing.faq-more-cong-answer: Not yet. Probably in a future we decide to support this feature but it adds complexity. However the app is configured to support multiple congregations. In the meanwhile we suggest you to use multiple browsers and it should work
landing.faq-sync: Is the data sync between devices?
landing.faq-sync-answer: Unfortunately no. You can always export and import data like you used to do with JW Library but it's not sync between devices or browsers. This helps us to make this app free of use
landing.faq-error: Can I suggest a feature or report an error?
landing.faq-error-answer: Yes you can! You can always go to
landing.faq-error-answer-2: and open an issue. Be precise and don't hesitate to propose things! Unfortunately I'm the only developer should things will maybe delay
landing.faq-support: Is there any way we can support you?
landing.faq-support-answer: Even though it flatters me, I don't accept any type of payments. If you wish to support me donate that money instead to
landing.faq-maintenance: Who is in charge of maintaining the app?
landing.faq-maintenance-answer: Currently, I'm the only developer working on this project. Even though I try to maintain the app as smooth as possible I cannot assure the app works 100% of the times
landing.you-can-also: You can also read the official documentation in:

errors.404-msg: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.
